summary: Fjori is a RaceMenu preset and part 3 of my RaceMenu preset series, aiming to cover both genders of all races.
descriptionHtml:
[b][font=Tahoma][size=5]Overview
[/size][/font][/b]This is a simple mod, and as the name implies, it's just a RaceMenu preset of a Female Nord Stormcloak named Fjori.

Fjori is Part 3 of my Racemenu presets. You can find the other ones here on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/41281005/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Profile[/url] 

[font=Tahoma][size=5][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/font][list]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos [/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7887/?]Pretty Face [/url]
[/list]
[b][font=Tahoma][size=5]Installation
[/size][/font][/b]Manual Installation made simple. Simply unzip into your Skyrim directory (not the data folder) and you're good to go.

[b][font=Tahoma][size=5]Updates
[/size][/font][/b]This mod likely won't need updating, but in the event it does, I'll add to this section

[list]
[*]v1.0 - Mod release
[/list]
[b][font=Tahoma][size=5]Extras
[/size][/font][/b]Mods used in screenshots[list]
[*]RaceMenu
[*]KS Hairdoos
[*]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio (UUNP)
[*]The Book of UUNP
[*]Demoniac 4k skin texture
[/list]
author: UmbraManum
